backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the backend, implementing user profile management, inquiry submission/retrieval, and admin-only access control using a mixin authorization pattern.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that the address 'Akurdi near Khandoba Mandir, Pimpri Chinchwad, Pune 411035' was added as plain text to the Contact page.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source files to short human-readable summaries describing each component's or page's purpose and recent changes.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS entry point that imports Tailwind layers and defines CSS custom properties for the design system's color tokens in both light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the React SPA, setting SEO meta tags, Open Graph data, Google Fonts (Playfair Display and Inter), and mounting the app at #root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with all page routes (Home, Products, Quality, GlobalFootprint, Contact, Admin) inside a shared Layout with Navigation, Footer, and WhatsAppButton.
frontend/src/components/CertificationBad: Reusable card component that displays a certification with an icon, name, subtitle badge, description, and optional italic note, styled with royal-blue and gold accents.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedProducts: Horizontally scrollable slider showing the first four products with left/right scroll buttons (desktop only), product category labels, truncated descriptions, and 'View Details' links.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site-wide footer with the AZAD NEXUS logo, brand description, LinkedIn/Instagram social links, quick navigation links, and contact details including email and address.
frontend/src/components/InquiriesTable.t: Renders a sortable table of rice export inquiries with columns for ID, name, company, country, rice variety, quantity, message, and submission timestamp. Supports ascending/descending sort on any column via clickable headers.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky top navigation bar with logo, desktop nav links, a 'Request a Quote' CTA button, and a responsive mobile hamburger menu using TanStack Router for navigation.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a single rice product card with an image, name, optional badge, description, and a specs table showing grain length, moisture content, and purity.
frontend/src/components/RegionCard.tsx: Card component displaying an export region with an icon, region name, covered countries, description, and a highlight badge.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppButton.t: Fixed floating WhatsApp contact button in the bottom-right corner that links to a specific WhatsApp number.
Simple card component displaying an icon, title, and description for a 'Why Choose Us' feature highlight.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Defines the Product and ProductSpec TypeScript interfaces and exports a static array of six rice products (basmati and non-basmati) with specs, descriptions, and image paths.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using TanStack Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) actors, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flow, identity persistence, and login status states for ICP-based authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for submitting and fetching inquiries, retrieving the caller's user profile, and checking admin status via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind CSS, defines AZAD NEXUS brand CSS custom properties (royal blue and gold palette) for light/dark modes, and adds utility classes for typography and layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Admin dashboard page that handles Internet Identity authentication, verifies admin privileges, and displays an inquiries table with login/access-denied/loading states.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page with a validated inquiry form allowing users to select rice variety, enter quantity and details, and submit via the useSubmitInquiry mutation with a success confirmation state.
frontend/src/pages/GlobalFootprint.tsx: Static page showcasing AZAD NEXUS export markets across four regions (Middle East, Europe, Southeast Asia, Africa) with stats and region cards.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page featuring a hero section with CTAs, company stats, a featured products slider, and a 'Why Choose Us' section.
frontend/src/pages/Products.tsx: Products page that displays Basmati and Non-Basmati rice categories in a tabbed layout using ProductCard components and filtered product data.
frontend/src/pages/QualityAssurance.tsx: Quality Assurance page detailing lab testing steps, packaging features, and certifications for AZAD NEXUS rice exports.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing functions to read, persist, and clear URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom brand color tokens (royal, gold, cream), typography fonts, shadows, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking existing features and a pending request to add a plain-text address to the Contact page.
